technology.short_description: "Give da gobbos sum extra grub ta keep 'em in check."

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Goblin units
Upkeep: -4% for Goblin units

technology.short_description: Goblin riders bounce wildly on the battlefield, bashing man and beast aside as they charge in and out.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Night Goblin Squig Hoppers and Wolf Rider units
Charge bonus: +20% for Night Goblin Squig Hoppers and Wolf Rider units

technology.short_description: "Gotta hand it to those Forest Goblins, easy to get dead wranglin' massive spiders. Better dem than us!"

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Spider Riders units
Melee attack: +5 for Spider Riders units
Missile strength: +10% for Spider Riders units

technology.short_description: "You betta get fasta or dere will be a smashin'!"

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Artillery units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Artillery units

technology.short_description: Despite its size, an Arachnarok is still a Spider by nature, using the terrain to its advantage when stalking and trapping its prey.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Arachnarok Spider units
Attribute: Stalk for Arachnarok Spider units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

technology.short_description: "Throw da gobbos sum iron scraps ta take a betta beating!"

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Goblin and Night Goblin Infantry units
Melee defence: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Strap anyfin' you can find onta da wolves to keep 'em whole."

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Wolf Rider units
Physical resistance: 10% for Wolf Rider units

technology.short_description: Better beast breeders lead to more devastating creatures to unleash onto the battlefield.

effects.description: Construction cost: -10% for Spider buildings
Construction cost: -10% for Squig buildings
Recruit rank: +1 for Squig and Spider units

technology.short_description: "We stole da designs from da stinkin' Elves!"

effects.description: Range: +5% for Missile Infantry units
Missile strength: +8% for Missile Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Shamans are nasty buggers as it iz, but Raknik iz one depraved gobbo!"

effects.description: Adds the Goblin Great Shaman Raknik Spiderclaw to your faction's Lord pool

technology.short_description: Although it is such a large target, the hide of these great beasts is thick and hard.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Colossal Squig, Feral Hydra and Feral Wyvern units
Ward save: 10% for Colossal Squig, Feral Hydra and Feral Wyvern units

technology.short_description: "Bigga camps means a bigga tribe, and more ladz for fightin’!"

effects.description: Growth: +10

technology.short_description: "Shuddup, da lot of ya! Or da Boss'll have ya!"

effects.description:
Corruption: -1
	(all provinces)
Control: +3

technology.short_description: "Dey taste like death, but do da opposite!"

effects.description: Hero capacity: +2 for Giant River Troll Hags
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Giant River Troll Hags
Casualty replenishment rate: +6%

technology.short_description: The Night Goblins strike from their natural vantage point: in the very beating heart of darkness itself.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Night Goblin units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 for Night Goblin units
Armour-piercing missile damage: +2 for Night Goblin units

technology.short_description: "If da gits can't run fasta, make 'em hide betta!"

effects.description: Hero capacity: +2 for Night Goblin Big Bosses
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Night Goblin Big Bosses
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for all Goblin units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

technology.short_description: "Dis Waaagh! just keeps on goin'! Get 'em, ladz!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Waaagh! Mobs units
	(all armies)

Attribute: Unbreakable for Waaagh! Mobs units
	(all armies)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

technology.short_description: "'Ere come da boyz! Dey want Waaagh!"

effects.description: Reputation: +1 per turn

technology.short_description: "Oi! Da Big Boss needz ya ta deal wiv dat uva fing!"

effects.description: Hero action cost: -15%
Hero action success chance: +5%

technology.short_description: "Love 'em equally, or else…"

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +15 with Greenskins

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: "You can keep my share of da loot, Boss! Jus' don't 'urt me!"

effects.description: Hero recruitment cost: -10%
Recruitment cost: -5%

technology.short_description: "Of course dey's not as good as you boss, but dey's still pretty good."

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Lord recruit rank: +4
Recruit rank: +1

technology.short_description: "Let’s see how dem useless gobbos work when we withhold some of their rations."

effects.description: Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
Construction time: -1 for settlement buildings

technology.short_description: "Gettin' a bit crowded 'round 'ere lately. Put da gits to good use!"

effects.description: Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units
Global recruitment capacity: +2

technology.short_description: "Da more scrap we can carry, da more stuff we’s gonna make for da killin’!"

effects.description: Scrap: +15 per turn

technology.short_description: "Each of these 'ere boys iz one of da ladz now, Boss. Makin' us proud!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -4%

technology.short_description: "Have ya eva seen such a pretty site? There aint nuthin' greena or meana than a full-blown Waaagh!"

effects.description: Improved rewards for each successful Waaagh!
Reputation: +5 per turn

technology.short_description: "Someone tell those gits to move those legs fasta or we'll send da Squigs after 'em!"

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

technology.short_description: "If we tell da ladz to kill each other less, dey can kill da enemy more!"

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Income from post-battle loot: +10%

technology.short_description: "Sometimes I fink dem Shamans are just wingin' it, but if dey's helpin' I ain't complainin'!"

effects.description: Hero capacity: +2 for Shamans
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Shamans

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: "If we send some of da big 'uns, I'm sure dey can 'convince' some of da other tribes' ladz to join us…"

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for all Orc Boyz, Big 'Uns and Savage Orc infantry and cavalry units
Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns units

technology.short_description: "So many shiny fings! We need a bigga cart so we make sure we gets it all!"

effects.description: Hero capacity: +2 for Black Orc Big Bosses and Goblin Big Bosses
Hero recruit rank: +3 for Black Orc Big Bosses and Goblin Big Bosses
Income from raiding: +25%
Income from sacking settlements: +15%

technology.short_description: "Look at all da strong boyz dat 'ave come to da Waaagh!"

effects.description:
Ward save: 5% for Waaagh! Mobs units
	(all armies)

Passive ability: "Primal Rage" for Waaagh! Mobs units
	(all armies)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

technology.short_description: "Da ladz keep chargin' ahead ta get dere first!"

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Orc Boyz, Savage Orcs, Orc Boar Boyz and Savage Orc Boar Boyz units
Leadership: +5 for Orc Boyz, Savage Orcs, Orc Boar Boyz and Savage Orc Boar Boyz units

technology.short_description: "Da bigga da wagonz, da 'arder dey will be smashin'."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Pump Wagon and Chariot units
Unit mass: +20% for Pump Wagon and Chariot units

technology.short_description: When they have time, Orcs file Boars' tusks or strap pointy things to them to better impale "da softies".

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Orc Boar units
Charge bonus: +5 for Orc Boar units

technology.short_description: "Ya can't teach a fish to climb a tree, but ya can teach a Troll to hit fings harder!"

effects.description: Battle healing cap: +10% for Trolls, River Trolls and Stone Trolls units
Recruit rank: +1 for Trolls, River Trolls and Stone Trolls units

technology.short_description: "I know a guy… he's pretty 'orrible."

effects.description: Adds the Orc Warboss Oglok the 'Orrible to your faction's Lord pool

technology.short_description: Black Orc axes tears through armour... and anyone unfortunate enough to be wearing it at the time.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Black Orc units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Black Orc units

technology.short_description: "The betta the metal, the betta the murderin'!"

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Orc Infantry units
Weapon strength: +4% for Orc Infantry units

technology.short_description: "Everyone knows dat a bit of red paint on anyfink makes everyfink go fasta!"

effects.description: Attribute: Glorious Charge for Greenskin Chariot units

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Greenskin Chariot units

technology.short_description: With a steady diet of hapless Goblins, Boars can become bigger, gaining more mass and a protective layer of fat.

effects.description: Unit mass: +15% for Orc Boar units
Physical resistance: 10% for Orc Boar units

technology.short_description: Giants pull down the biggest trees to use as clubs, clobbering anything in their path.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6 for Giant units
Weapon strength: +8% for Giant units

technology.short_description: Each rock that smashes the ground whether from the arm of a rogue idol or the sling of a rock lobber sends out a devastating shockwave that shakes the earth itself.

effects.description: Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence) for Rogue Idol and Goblin Rock Lobber units
Weapon strength: +10% for Rogue Idol units
Missile strength: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber units

technology.short_description: "Oi! Imagine if we made dem beasties even nastier!"

effects.description: Unlocks the Bladed Mandibles Scrap Upgrade for Spider Hatchlings and Forest Goblin Spider Riders units
Unlocks the Swamp Shroom Powda Scrap Upgrade for Troll and Feral Hydra units
Unlocks the Squig Spikes Scrap Upgrade for Night Goblin Squig Hopper, Squig Herd and Mangler Squig units

technology.short_description: Goblins are born scavengers, able to find dubious treasure in the most useless of places.

effects.description: Unlocks the Rusty Stabberz Scrap Upgrade for Nasty Skulkers and Goblin Wolf Riders units
Unlocks the Liquor Flasks Scrap Upgrade for Savage Orc and Troll units
Unlocks the Spikier Bitz Scrap Upgrade for Night Goblins and Night Goblins (Fanatics) units
Unlocks the Water Flasks Scrap Upgrade for Nasty Skulkers units

technology.short_description: As long as it flies at least somewhat straight, nobody cares what it is made of.

Unlocks the Heavy Ammo Scrap Upgrade for Goblin Archers, Goblin Wolf Rider Archers and Forest Goblin Spider Rider Archers units

technology.short_description: "Da battle's over, ladz! Now go 'n' pick up anyfink dat's 'andy!"

Unlocks the Bigga Sticks Scrap Upgrade for Savage Orcs units
Unlocks the Betta Blades Scrap Upgrade for Orc Boyz, Orc Big ‘Uns, Savage Orc Big ‘Uns, Orc Boar Boy and Savage Orc Boar Boyz units
Unlocks the Scrap Armour Scrap Upgrade for Orc Big 'Uns and Orc Boar Boy Big ‘Uns units

technology.short_description: "Look at all dat smashin' an' skewerin' stuff! Dem squishies sure make big throwas!"

effects.description: Unlocks the Bigga Rocks Scrap Upgrade for Goblin Rock Lobber and Arachnarok (Flinger) units
Unlocks the Borrowed Bolts Scrap Upgrade for Bolt Throwa units
Unlocks the Betta Wing Suits Scrap Upgrade for Doom Diver Catapults units

technology.short_description: Greenskin ingenuity is as mind-boggling as it is effective.

effects.description: Unlocks the Chariot Armour Scrap Upgrade for Goblin Wolf Chariots and Orc Boar Chariots units
Unlocks the Pump Plating Scrap Upgrade for Snotling Pump Wagon units

technology.short_description: "We hit da jackpot, boyz!"

effects.description: Unlocks the Da Best Blades Scrap Upgrade for Black Orc units
Unlocks the Da Biggest Sticks Scrap Upgrade for Orc Boar Boy Big 'Uns Savage Orc Boar Boy Big ‘Uns units
Unlocks the Sharpenin' Stones Scrap Upgrade for Black Orc units

technology.short_description: A concert development involving rocks, lots of rolling, and hard metals.

effects.description: Unlocks the Bigga Squig Spikes Scrap Upgrade for Colossal Squig  units
Unlocks the Scrap Gauntlets Scrap Upgrade for Rogue Idol units
